org.jetel.util

Class JAXBContextProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.util.JAXBContextProvider

  • public class JAXBContextProvider
extends java.lang.Object
    JAXB contexts cache to prevent class leaks caused by their repeated creation, see https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/CXF-2939 Anyway, JAXBContext is a heavy-weight object - it should be cached.
